Lost in Legislation 
 
 What is it? What is the prerequisite for racism? 
 A feeling that encases some and not others. 
 They say in America that we're all brothers. 
 Yet we cover up our underlying feelings... 
 
 
 The rest of the poem, discussing gay rights, is at poeticinjustice.net tilted Lost in Legislation, I have a forums page as well

 Of which the only one I have a problem with is under age sex. Any acts that do not injure outers, and are between consenting adults should be legal. Yes, that means that if a man wants to lie with another man who is lying with a woman who is lying with another woman, I think it is fine. If all four of them want a 12-year-old in the middle, then they all should be locked up. I think prostitution should be legalized, and taxed! There is no reason to have the government or a preacher in my bedroom, unless we all consent to what ever is going to happen.
